summary: This is an email forwarding a Daily Mail article about an attorney who criticized Prince Andrew and vowed to aggressively pursue leads in the Epstein investigation. The email includes metadata about the sender, recipient, and date.

persons.name: Geoffre Berman
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the email forwarding a news article about the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Mentioned in the article title as someone who was criticized by an attorney in relation to the Epstein probe.

events.title: Daily Mail Article Publication
events.description: Daily Mail publishes article about an attorney criticizing Prince Andrew and vowing to pursue leads in Epstein probe.

keyFacts: An attorney criticized Prince Andrew in relation to the Epstein investigation.
The attorney vowed to 'ruthlessly pursue all leads' in the Epstein probe.
U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman forwarded this news article via email on February 2, 2020.
